channel.title: Connecting MIDI piano to Axoloti
channel.description:
Hi, sorry for this stupid question. I would connect my MIDI piano to Axoloti and take notes played on it, but I can't find the right object.
Is there an object (like "midi/in/keyb" for USB keyboard) to select my MIDI piano (linked in Axoloti DIN) like a source? Thank a lot.

item.title: Connecting MIDI piano to Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

midi/in objects are use for both usb and midi din

( filtering is done within the patch/subpatch properties)

Read full topic
